mapper.sql: id, name, create_at, update_at, create_by, update_by, delete_at

mapper.select: select qys_suiteid, qys_suite_secret, qys_suite_aeskey, qys_token, qys_ticket, qys_ips, qys_suite_access_token, qys_access_token_expires, qys_pre_auth_code, qys_auth_code_expires, qys_provider, qys_status, qys_created, qys_updated, qys_deleted from uc_wxqy_suite where qys_suiteid = #{qysSuiteid}

select qys_suiteid, qys_suite_secret, qys_suite_aeskey, qys_token, qys_ticket, qys_ips, qys_suite_access_token, qys_access_token_expires, qys_pre_auth_code, qys_auth_code_expires, qys_provider, qys_status, qys_created, qys_updated, qys_deleted from uc_wxqy_suite limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into uc_wxqy_suite(qys_suiteid, qys_suite_secret, qys_suite_aeskey, qys_token, qys_ticket, qys_ips, qys_suite_access_token, qys_access_token_expires, qys_pre_auth_code, qys_auth_code_expires, qys_provider, qys_status, qys_created, qys_updated, qys_deleted) values (#{qysSuiteid}, #{qysSuiteSecret}, #{qysSuiteAeskey}, #{qysToken}, #{qysTicket}, #{qysIps}, #{qysSuiteAccessToken}, #{qysAccessTokenExpires}, #{qysPreAuthCode}, #{qysAuthCodeExpires}, #{qysProvider}, #{qysStatus}, #{qysCreated}, #{qysUpdated}, #{qysDeleted})

insert into uc_wxqy_suite(qys_suite_secret, qys_suite_aeskey, qys_token, qys_ticket, qys_ips, qys_suite_access_token, qys_access_token_expires, qys_pre_auth_code, qys_auth_code_expires, qys_provider, qys_status, qys_created, qys_updated, qys_deleted) values
(#{entity.qysSuiteSecret}, #{entity.qysSuiteAeskey}, #{entity.qysToken}, #{entity.qysTicket}, #{entity.qysIps}, #{entity.qysSuiteAccessToken}, #{entity.qysAccessTokenExpires}, #{entity.qysPreAuthCode}, #{entity.qysAuthCodeExpires}, #{entity.qysProvider}, #{entity.qysStatus}, #{entity.qysCreated}, #{entity.qysUpdated}, #{entity.qysDeleted})

insert into uc_wxqy_suite(qys_suite_secret, qys_suite_aeskey, qys_token, qys_ticket, qys_ips, qys_suite_access_token, qys_access_token_expires, qys_pre_auth_code, qys_auth_code_expires, qys_provider, qys_status, qys_created, qys_updated, qys_deleted) values
(#{entity.qysSuiteSecret}, #{entity.qysSuiteAeskey}, #{entity.qysToken}, #{entity.qysTicket}, #{entity.qysIps}, #{entity.qysSuiteAccessToken}, #{entity.qysAccessTokenExpires}, #{entity.qysPreAuthCode}, #{entity.qysAuthCodeExpires}, #{entity.qysProvider}, #{entity.qysStatus}, #{entity.qysCreated}, #{entity.qysUpdated}, #{entity.qysDeleted})
on duplicate key update qys_suite_secret = values(qys_suite_secret) , qys_suite_aeskey = values(qys_suite_aeskey) , qys_token = values(qys_token) , qys_ticket = values(qys_ticket) , qys_ips = values(qys_ips) , qys_suite_access_token = values(qys_suite_access_token) , qys_access_token_expires = values(qys_access_token_expires) , qys_pre_auth_code = values(qys_pre_auth_code) , qys_auth_code_expires = values(qys_auth_code_expires) , qys_provider = values(qys_provider) , qys_status = values(qys_status) , qys_created = values(qys_created) , qys_updated = values(qys_updated) , qys_deleted = values(qys_deleted)
mapper.update:
update uc_wxqy_suite
qys_suite_secret = #{qysSuiteSecret},
qys_suite_aeskey = #{qysSuiteAeskey},
qys_token = #{qysToken},
qys_ticket = #{qysTicket},
qys_ips = #{qysIps},
qys_suite_access_token = #{qysSuiteAccessToken},
qys_access_token_expires = #{qysAccessTokenExpires},
qys_pre_auth_code = #{qysPreAuthCode},
qys_auth_code_expires = #{qysAuthCodeExpires},
qys_provider = #{qysProvider},
qys_status = #{qysStatus},
qys_created = #{qysCreated},
qys_updated = #{qysUpdated},
qys_deleted = #{qysDeleted},
where qys_suiteid = #{qysSuiteid}
